products.title: Verona Vision Platinum Day and Night Blind
products.description: Revive your interior with the sleek verona vision platinum day and night roller blind. With a funky slatted look combining horizontal strips of light silver polyester fabric and voile, this blind will visually enhance any contemporary space, whilst the innovative design is highly versatile when it comes to adjusting the light and privacy levels in your room. Product id: db-vrbx1349 fabric colour: platinum material: 100% polyester energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes verona vision platinum day and night blind in grey.
